About Me

Hello, my name is Julia Nething and I'm currently a member of the February 2015 cohort of Hack Reactor. Before Hack Reactor, I graduated in 2014 from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill with a major in Peace, War, and Defense and minors in Computer Science and Russian Culture. Thanks for visiting, and please feel free to email me if you have any questions!
